data.title: Matt Damon: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Matt Damon: Check out the list of all Matt Damon movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Matt Damon news on Times of India.
data.text:
Matt Damon reflects on press scrutiny and career differences with Ben Affleck

etimes.in / Aug 14, 2024, 14:34 (IST)

Damon acknowledged that he and Affleck have had similar careers, both rising to fame with their Oscar-winning film Good Will Hunting and later starring in major franchises and blockbuster movies. Despite their parallel career paths, Damon feels fortunate to have avoided the level of press scrutiny that Affleck has experienced.

Hulk Hogan might return to the Courtroom, Lets take at What could spark his Next Legal Battle

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Aug 09, 2024, 22:19 (IST)

Hulk Hogan may take legal action against the team behind Ben Affleck and Matt Damon's upcoming film about the Gawker scandal if his portrayal is deemed sensational or inaccurate. Although currently indifferent, Hogan is prepared to sue if his privacy is infringed. The film will explore the trials and aftermath of Hogan's tape release and his lawsuit against Gawker.

Matt Damon shares pro tips for 'girl dads'; showers praise on daughter Alexia's 'Incredible' boyfriend

etimes.in / Aug 02, 2024, 21:56 (IST)

Matt Damon shared his approach to parenting daughters Isabella, Gia, Stella, and Alexia in a SiriusXM interview, stressing support and self-esteem over strictness. He downplayed the tough dad stereotype, praising Alexia’s boyfriend as "incredible." Damon also revealed his wife, Luciana, persuaded him to join The Instigators, and he trusts her judgment completely.

Matt Damon dazzles at the 'The Instigators' premiere with family; reveals how wife Luciana's influence shaped his latest role - See photo

etimes.in / Aug 01, 2024, 18:11 (IST)

On July 31, the 53-year-old Oscar winner wowed at The Instigators premiere in New York with his family, including wife Luciana Barroso and their daughters. He revealed that Barroso's strong involvement and taste played a key role in his decision to join the film, which opens August 2.

Matt Damon and Ben Affleck’s reunion in “RIP” to stream on THIS popular OTT

etimes.in / Jul 03, 2024, 17:38 (IST)

Netflix has secured the rights to the eagerly anticipated crime thriller "RIP," starring Matt Damon and Ben Affleck, marking a triumphant reunion for the duo behind "Good Will Hunting." Directed by Joe Carnahan, the project promises intense suspense, unexpected twists, and a rollercoaster of emotions.Plot details for "RIP" are tightly guarded, but with Damon and Affleck leading the charge under their production company Artists Equity, audiences can expect a gripping cinematic experience. Their collaboration spans decades, showcasing a knack for compelling narratives from "Dogma" to "The Last Duel."

Matt Damon and Ben Affleck team up for new crime thriller 'RIP' directed by Joe Carnahan

Jun 19, 2024, 12:01 (IST)

While representatives from Artists Equity were not available for comment, the news has generated significant excitement. The details of the plot are still under wraps, but the film is described as a crime thriller. Distributors are already showing interest, and it's likely to find a home with either a theatrical or streaming platform soon

John Krasinski's 'IF' starring Ryan Reynolds has a $55 million debut at global box office

AP / May 20, 2024, 05:27 (IST)

John Krasinski's 'IF' movie, starring Ryan Reynolds, topped the US box office with a $35 million debut, facing competition from 'Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes' and 'The Strangers-Chapter 1' as Memorial Day weekend approaches. The film managed to earn an additional $20 million from global markets, taking its overall global collection to an estimated $55 million.

Ryan Gosling and Emily Blunt: 'The Fall Guy' is a love letter to stunt performers

Reuters / Apr 23, 2024, 05:10 (IST)

Following their role as Ken in "Barbie" and Kitty in "Oppenheimer", actors Ryan Gosling and Emily Blunt shift focus to the behind-the-scenes heroes of Hollywood in their latest project, "The Fall Guy". Inspired by the beloved 1980s TV series, Gosling takes on the role of Colt Seavers, a renowned Hollywood stuntman whose luck takes a downturn following an on-set mishap.

Mark Wahlberg opens up on Scorsese, hair extensions and 'The Departed'

IANS / Mar 25, 2024, 15:28 (IST)

Mark Wahlberg reflects on challenges faced while filming 'The Departed' and appreciates the opportunities it brought. He discusses working with a star-studded cast and the experience of receiving an Oscar nomination.

Was Christopher Nolan paid $100 MILLION for 'Oppenheimer'?

etimes.in / Mar 13, 2024, 07:52 (IST)

'Oppenheimer', directed by Christopher Nolan, won 7 Oscars at the 96th Academy Awards on Sunday, including Best Picture. According to the latest reports, Nolan earned just under $100 million for the film. This includes his director's fees, bonus and profits from the film's $958 million haul at the global box office.

Robert Downey Jr. wins his first Oscar for Best Supporting Actor for 'Oppenheimer'; dedicates win to wife Susan Downey and 'terrible childhood'

TNN & Agencies / Mar 11, 2024, 06:23 (IST)

Robert Downey Jr. won his first Academy Award for best supporting actor in Oppenheimer three decades after he was first nominated in 1993 for his work on 'Chaplin'. Oppenheimer, Christopher Nolan's three-hour deep dive into the development and fallout of the atomic bomb during World War II, led the Academy Awards with 13 nominations.

Matt Damon hopes to return to another 'Jason Bourne' movie

PTI / Feb 20, 2024, 17:41 (IST)

Matt Damon confirms director Edward Berger is working on a new Jason Bourne story. Damon is excited to work with Berger and hopes for a great movie. He is open to passing on the role. Damon will star in the Netflix thriller Animals, directed by Ben Affleck.

Matt Damon teases possibility of 'Bourne 6': deets inside

etimes.in / Feb 15, 2024, 14:45 (IST)

Damon remained tight-lipped about specific details regarding Bourne 6. However, he did share intriguing insights into the project's development. According to Damon, director Edward Berger, acclaimed for his work on All Quiet on the Western Front, is actively involved in shaping the narrative for the upcoming film

Did you know that Irrfan Khan chose Piku over Matt Damon’s The Martian?

etimes.in / Jan 08, 2024, 11:00 (IST)

Irrfan Khan, a renowned Indian actor, chose to prioritize Shoojit Sircar's film "Piku" over Ridley Scott's "The Martian," where he was initially cast as Vincent Kapoor. Piku's scheduling conflicted, and Irrfan, valuing the evolving phase of Indian cinema, opted for it, stating, "I'll explore Mars later; let me see Earth first."

Is Jennifer Garner REUNITING with ex-husband Ben Affleck for an upcoming thriller with Matt Damon?

etimes.in / Feb 16, 2024, 16:22 (IST)

Jennifer Garner and Ben Affleck may reunite for the crime thriller 'Animals' starring Matt Damon. Garner in talks for leading lady, Affleck to helm. The film centers around a mayoral candidate and his wife whose son is kidnapped. If Garner joins, it would be her first on-screen collaboration with Affleck since 'Daredevil'.

Top 5 hits and misses in commercials of Super Bowl 2024

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Feb 13, 2024, 22:23 (IST)

​The excitement of Super Bowl LVIII extended beyond the game itself, as advertisers unleashed a barrage of commercials vying for viewers' attention during the Kansas City Chiefs' nail-biting 25-22 victory over the San Francisco 49ers.​​ Etsy's Super Bowl commercial took a bold approach with a joke about France. The ad's commitment to humor and the uniqueness of the concept set it apart, leaving a lasting impression on viewers.

Oscars 2024: Jimmy Kimmel ROASTS Academy Awards in Barbie themed trailer starring Ryan Gosling, America Ferrera and Kate McKinnon - WATCH

etimes.in / Feb 13, 2024, 12:47 (IST)

Jimmy Kimmel releases a hilarious 'Barbie'-themed skit for the 96th Academy Awards. With help from the cast of 'Barbie' Kate McKinnon and Helen Mirren and Oscar-nominees, America Ferrera and Ryan Gosling, Kimmel took jibes at the voting committee's controversial snubs. The Oscars will be held on March 10.

Mohit Raina: Always been a fan of Jason Bourne

IANS / Dec 13, 2023, 12:35 (IST)

Mohit Raina, the actor of 'The Freelancer: The Conclusion', reveals that he draws inspiration from the 'Jason Bourne' franchise. The series, based on the book 'A Ticket to Syria' by Shirish Thorat, follows Mohit's character Avinash Kamath on his final extraction mission. Directed by Bhav Dhulia and created by Neeraj Pandey, the show also features Sushant Singh, John Kokken, Gauri Balaji, Navneet Malik, Manjiri Faddnis, and Sarah Jane Dias. Set to stream on Disney+ Hotstar, 'The Freelancer: The Conclusion' premieres on December 15.

Sunmi shares insights on her scandal-free journey, limited dating experience

etimes.in / Oct 23, 2023, 19:33 (IST)

Sunmi, a prominent K-pop artist, appeared on a radio show to promote her latest music release. The host asked her why she has managed to stay away from scandals throughout her career. Sunmi attributed her lack of scandal to her limited dating experience and cautious approach towards people. She also shared her ideal type, mentioning someone with a longer face like actor Matt Damon. Sunmi's honesty and dedication to her craft have allowed her to maintain a scandal-free image in the entertainment industry.
